snippet: Warren E. Buffett criticized the trading culture of Wall Street. | A venture capitalist is betting he will find the next Mark Zuckerberg in China. | The S.E.C. charged the Chinese affiliates of five big accounting firms with violating securities...
abstract: Warren E. Buffett criticized the trading culture of Wall Street. | A venture capitalist is betting he will find the next Mark Zuckerberg in China. | The S.E.C. charged the Chinese affiliates of five big accounting firms with violating securities laws. | Hollywood films about the evils of capitalism are often financed with tax incentives.

headline.main: Buffett on the State of Wall Street
